T02D1244:175a-1: bi shuddha ni dhi n'a ma he badzra s'a dha nam /
T02D1244:175a-3: kye rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par dag pa'i gter zhes bya ba /
T02D1244:175a-4: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1244:175a-5: h'u% skyes sngon po nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spyan gyis phyug pa'i zhal brgyad pa //
T02D1244:175a-6: bcu drug phyag ste zhabs kyis bdud bzhi gnon zhing brgya phyed mgo phreng can //
T02D1244:175a-7: phyag rgya lnga 'chang bdag med ma yis mgrin 'khyud dkar mo la sogs kyis //
T02D1244:175a-8: bskor bar phyag byas nas ni de yi sgrub pa'i thabs ni brjod par bya //
T02D1244:175a-9: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1244:175a-10: aom raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02D1244:175a-11: zhes pa 'dis bdag dang gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung ngo //
T02D1244:175a-12: sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i sems kyis /
T02D1244:175a-13: dpal kye rdo rjer gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing /
T02D1244:175a-15: yang dag par rjes su gnang shing /
T02D1244:175a-16: stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pa'i
T02D1244:175a-17: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rnyed pa'i mtshan
T02D1244:175a-18: ma thob pa / thogs pa med cing the tshom med pa'i shes rab dang bcas pa /
T02D1244:175a-19: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02D1244:175a-20: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i bde ba'i stan la
T02D1244:175a-21: 'dug nas bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig
T02D1244:175a-22: bsten te / dpal ldan rdo rje'i nga rgyal ba'i
T02D1244:175a-23: snying gar padma la re pha yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1244:175a-24: nyi mar h'u% yig sngon po blta bar bya'o //
T02D1244:175a-25: h'u% yig de las steng du spros pa'i 'od zer
T02D1244:175a-26: rnam pa lngas khams gsum po snang bar byed bzhin
T02D1244:175a-27: du mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su /
T02D1244:175a-28: bcom ldan 'das phyag bcu drug pa /
T02D1244:175a-30: zhal so so la spyan gsum pa /
T02D1244:175a-31: skra ser skya gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1244:175a-32: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D1244:175a-34: lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1244:175b-0: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag gi mtshon cha @175b dang /
T02D1244:175b-1: spro ba dang sdud pa'i sku bsam par bya'o //
T02D1244:175b-2: de'i mdun du goo r'i nag mo phyag na zla ba byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D1244:175b-3: g-yas su chom rkun ma btsod kyi mdog can phyag
T02D1244:175b-4: na nyi ma ste rang byung gi me tog ces
T02D1244:175b-5: bya ba dang / rgyab tu ro langs ma ser mo phyag na rdo rje'i chu'i snod dang /
T02D1244:175b-6: g-yon du ghasma r'i sngo bsangs gsang ba'i sman 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1244:175b-7: mdun gyi g-yon zur du spos mo sngon mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i stobs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1244:175b-8: mdun gyi g-yas zur du ri khrod ma dkar mo phyag na ro'i rgyun dang /
T02D1244:175b-9: rgyab kyi g-yas zur du gtum mo kun nas dmar bar cang te'u 'khrol ba dang /
T02D1244:175b-10: rgyab kyi g-yon zur du g-yung mo dud ka rang gi sku la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1244:175b-11: rnal 'byor mi 'di rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bcom ldan 'das bkug cing brtan par byas nas /
T02D1244:175b-12: de nas 'od zer de rnams snying ga'i sa bon la gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1244:175b-13: slar yang sa bon de las mthon pa'i phyi dang
T02D1244:175b-14: gsang ba dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'i
T02D1244:175b-15: khyad par rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par
T02D1244:175b-16: bya ste / de la me tog dang bdug pa
T02D1244:175b-17: dang mar me dang zhal zas dang rin po che
T02D1244:175b-18: bdun po la sogs pa rnams stobs pa ni phyi'i
T02D1244:175b-19: bya ste / mchod pa'o // lha mo brgyad kyis
T02D1244:175b-20: bdun rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga stobs pa zhes
T02D1244:175b-21: bya ba gsang ba'i mchod pa'o //
T02D1244:175b-22: bla ma'i man ngag las bdag med pa dang lhan
T02D1244:175b-23: cig ro gcig pa'i dga' bas gnyis su myong ba
T02D1244:175b-24: ni de kho na nyid kyis chod pa'o //
T02D1244:175b-25: yang dag par mchod cing lus dang ngag dang yid
T02D1244:175b-26: kyis mngon du phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar sdig
T02D1244:175b-27: pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1244:175b-28: thog ma med pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor pa'i dam
T02D1244:175b-29: pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa rnams kyis
T02D1244:175b-30: bdag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang /
T02D1244:175b-32: rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni bshags shing slar mi bgyi'o //
T02D1244:175b-33: so so'i skye bo dang lha rnams dang nyan thos
T02D1244:175b-34: dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1244:175b-35: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D1244:175b-36: dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang ngo
T02D1244:175b-37: // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med
T02D1244:175b-38: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo
T02D1244:176a-1: khams gsum po kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba chen
T02D1244:176a-2: po'i rnam pa'i he ru ka rdo rje sangs rgyas
T02D1244:176a-3: dang / des bstan pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang
T02D1244:176a-4: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos dang
T02D1244:176a-5: dang / / de'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dge 'dun la /
T02D1244:176a-6: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar ji srid par skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1244:176a-7: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa /
T02D1244:176a-8: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong
T02D1244:176a-9: pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1244:176a-10: byang chub bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can gyi
T02D1244:176a-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1244:176a-12: 'di rnams kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D1244:176a-13: lam gang yin pa rdo rje'i theg pa la bdag
T02D1244:176a-15: de'i 'og tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D1244:176a-16: yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lus dbul bar
T02D1244:176a-17: bya'o // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i
T02D1244:176a-18: slad du bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1244:176a-19: sems dpa' rnams mgon po la gsol ba 'debs so
T02D1244:176a-20: bya'o // // 'khor bar gnas pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol ba rnams byas nas /
T02D1244:176a-21: de nas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa
T02D1244:176a-22: lta bur lha'i bde bas nye bar 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D1244:176a-23: pa can gyi byams pa chen po dang /
T02D1244:176a-24: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi chu gter du
T02D1244:176a-25: bying zhing skyabs med pa'i sems can thams cad sdug
T02D1244:176a-26: bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las 'dod pa'i rang
T02D1244:176a-27: bzhin gyi snying rje chen po dang /
T02D1244:176a-28: bde ba chen po dang ma bral bas yongs su tshim pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1244:176a-29: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyi gnyen po'i lam gyis
T02D1244:176a-30: nye bar 'dzin pa'i rnam pa can gyi btang snyoms
T02D1244:176a-33: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid shes
T02D1244:176a-34: rab kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tsam gyi
T02D1244:176a-35: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par mos
T02D1244:176a-36: shing don de mthong zhing snang bar byed pa nyid
T02D1244:176a-37: kyi phyir dang / dngos po ma lus pa'i de
T02D1244:176a-38: kho na nyid kyi snying pos bsdus pa nyid kyi
T02D1244:176a-39: kyi phyir dang / phyir na / aom sh'u n+ya
T02D1244:176a-40: t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a w'atma ko& ham zhes
T02D1244:176a-41: pa'i sngags 'di dag yid kyis brjod nas /
T02D1244:176a-42: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las /
T02D1244:176a-43: ma skyes shing ma 'gags pa'i gnas la /
T02D1244:176b-0: mi gnas @176b pa'i tshul gyis yud tsam du gnas so //
T02D1244:176b-1: 'di ni 'od gsal zhing dga' bar bya ba'i chos
T02D1244:176b-2: kyi de kho na nyid gang yin par brjod par
T02D1244:176b-3: bya ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D1244:176b-4: pa yang de yin te bdud thams cad rab tu
T02D1244:176b-6: de'i rjes su smon lam gyi nus pa'i shugs las
T02D1244:176b-7: de nas 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs
T02D1244:176b-8: pa'i rnam pas / re pha las byung ba'i nyi
T02D1244:176b-9: ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u% sngon po yongs
T02D1244:176b-11: 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1244:176b-12: sna tshogs rdo rje de'i 'od zer 'jig pa'i dus
T02D1244:176b-13: kyi me ltar bzod par dga' ba thams cad du
T02D1244:176b-14: spros pas / rdo rje'i ra ba stug por gyur
T02D1244:176b-15: cing rgyar ji tsam 'dod pa'i thad kar gru bzhi
T02D1244:176b-17: de'i steng du rdo rje'i gur dang /
T02D1244:176b-18: 'og tu de las rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis ni /
T02D1244:176b-19: sa 'og gi bar du rnam par bkra ba blta bar bya'o //
T02D1244:176b-20: de nas nyi ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje las 'od zer byung ba phyogs bral du spros nas /
T02D1244:176b-21: de thams cad brtan por bya'o //
T02D1244:176b-22: de'i dbus su bhr'um yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1244:176b-23: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa 'khor zhing mi g-yo ba dang mtshungs pa /
T02D1244:176b-24: rtsibs bcu pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su sna tshogs rdo
T02D1244:176b-25: rje'i steng du padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i steng
T02D1244:176b-26: du zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor ba'i bar
T02D1244:176b-27: du gnas pa'i h'u% yig bltas nas /
T02D1244:176b-28: me long la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rim gyis
T02D1244:176b-29: h'u% las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das h'u% mdzad aindra
T02D1244:176b-31: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1244:176b-32: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D1244:176b-33: phyag dag gis rdo rje dang /
T02D1244:176b-34: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas rang 'dra'i rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D1244:176b-35: g-yon brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis 'jigs byed dus mtshan ma mnan te bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1244:176b-36: de nas bla ma dam pa'i man ngag las rdo
T02D1244:176b-37: rje dang thod pa'i sbyor bas khro bo bcu po
T02D1244:176b-39: de las shar dang lho dang nub dang byang rnams su /
T02D1244:176b-40: gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang /
T02D1244:176b-41: padma mthar byed dang bgegs mthar byed rnams go rims
T02D1244:176b-42: bzhin du sku mdog nag po dang dkar po dang
T02D1244:176b-43: dmar po dang sngon po ste /
T02D1244:177a-3: kha gyes pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02D1244:177a-4: thung zhing gsus khyim che ba /
T02D1244:177a-5: sbrul gdug pa brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1244:177a-6: skra ser skya gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1244:177a-7: spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa /
T02D1244:177a-8: rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang 'od
T02D1244:177a-9: dpag med dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan can
T02D1244:177a-10: / stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1244:177a-11: me dang bden bral dang rlung dang dbang ldan gyi zur rnams su /
T02D1244:177a-12: 'dod pa dang dbyug pa sngon po dang stobs po che dang mi g-yo ba ste /
T02D1244:177a-14: lcags kyu dang dbyug pa dang rtse gsum dang ral gri 'dzin pa /
T02D1244:177a-15: 'dod pa dang mi g-yo ba dag ni /
T02D1244:177a-17: gos dam pa dang rin po che dam pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1244:177a-18: ring po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1244:177a-20: stobs po che dag ni gshin rje mthar byed lta bur rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1244:177a-21: 'og gi rtsibs la gnod mdzes nag po gtun shing 'dzin pa rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1244:177a-23: gtsug tor ser po 'khor lo ser po 'dzin pa /
T02D1244:177a-24: rnam par snang mdzad kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1244:177a-25: 'dod pa la sogs pa lnga ni mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can te /
T02D1244:177a-26: khro bo bcu po 'di rnams ni /
T02D1244:177a-27: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la g-yon brkyang gi stabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D1244:177a-28: phyag g-yon rnams kyis sbrul gyi zhags pa dang bcas
T02D1244:177a-29: pa'i khu tshur dang sdigs mdzub snying ga'i phyogs su
T02D1244:177a-30: gtad pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D1244:177a-31: de ltar gyur pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1244:177a-32: de nas de'i dbus su rdo rje h'u% mdzad yongs su gyur pa las chos 'byung zhes bya ba /
T02D1244:177a-33: nam mkha'i 'byung ba chen po aee yig gi rnam pa zur gsum pa /
T02D1244:177a-34: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rang bzhin /
T02D1244:177a-35: ston ka'i ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar ba /
T02D1244:177a-36: rtsa ba phra zhing steng yangs pa /
T02D1244:177a-37: nang stong pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1244:177a-38: de'i nang du kha dog sna tshogs pa'i padma /
T02D1244:177a-39: de'i ze 'bru'i steng du shin tu yangs pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1244:177a-40: de la shar gyi rtse mo gsum dkar po //
T02D1244:177b-1: dbus kyi kha dog sngon por bsam par bya'o //
T02D1244:177b-2: der yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon
T02D1244:177b-3: po gzhu'i rnam pa mchog ma gnyis la g-yo ba'i
T02D1244:177b-5: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1244:177b-6: dmar po gru gsum pa zur gsum du ram yig
T02D1244:177b-7: gis mtshan pa / de'i steng du wam las skyes
T02D1244:177b-8: pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas
T02D1244:177b-9: gis mtshan pa / mtshan pa / de'i steng du
T02D1244:177b-10: lam las byung ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru
T02D1244:177b-11: bzhi pa zur rnams su rdo rje rtse gsum pas
T02D1244:177b-12: gis mtshan pa / mtshan pa / mtshan pa'o //
T02D1244:177b-13: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i stegs bu'i dbus su
T02D1244:177b-14: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sems tsam gyi 'byung
T02D1244:177b-15: ba chen po bzhi yongs su gyur pa las skyes
T02D1244:177b-16: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bsdus
T02D1244:177b-17: pa'i rang bzhin thar pa chen po'i grong khyer /
T02D1244:177b-18: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin rin po che
T02D1244:177b-19: sna tshogs pa las byung ba'i gru bzhi pa sgo
T02D1244:177b-20: bzhi pa ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa
T02D1244:177b-25: mri dam ga ma dud kha /
T02D1244:177b-30: gar ma mdog sna tshogs ma /
T02D1244:177b-33: mar me ma gser lta bu /
T02D1244:177b-40: rang rang gi ming gi yi ge dang po /
T02D1244:177b-41: zla ba phyed pa dang thig le dang ldan pa las rdzogs pa /
T02D1244:177b-42: rang rang gi ming dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa /
T02D1244:177b-43: rtsa ba'i sgo'i logs gnyis gnyis su rnal 'byor ma
T02D1244:177b-44: gnyis gnyis go rims bzhin du rnam par bkod pa'i
T02D1244:177b-45: mchod pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rnam par brgyan
T02D1244:177b-46: pa / dra ba dra phyed me tog phreng //
T02D1244:177b-47: bla re me long rnga yab dang //
T02D1244:177b-48: rdo rje'i thig ni mdzes pa dang //
T02D1244:177b-50: g-yo zhing ra ba'i ba dan mchog / khor yug tu ni dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1244:177b-51: mchog gi 'dod pa lnga po yi //
T02D1244:178a-2: khang pa brtsegs pa dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba bsam par bya ste /
T02D1244:178a-3: de la dur khrod rnams ni /
T02D1244:178a-4: shar du gtum drag gi dur khrod du shing shi ri sha dang /
T02D1244:178a-5: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa glang po'i gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-8: sprin sgrogs pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-9: me'i mtshams su drag tu dgod pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod du shing ka ranydza dang /
T02D1244:178a-10: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa ra'i gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-13: sprin stug po zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-14: lhor lhag ma zhes bya ba'i dur khrod du shing aa mra dang /
T02D1244:178a-15: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa ma he'i gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-18: sprin kun du 'khor ba zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-19: bden bral du k'i li k'i li sgrogs pa'i dur khrod du shing la t'a parka t'i dang /
T02D1244:178a-20: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa ro'i gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-23: sprin rab tu gang ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-24: nub tu 'bar zhing 'khrugs pa'i dur khrod du shing aa sho ka dang /
T02D1244:178a-25: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa chu srin gyi gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-28: sprin 'jigs pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-29: rlung gi mtshams su 'jigs pa'i mun pa'i dur khrod du shing aardzu na dang /
T02D1244:178a-30: rdzu 'phrul chen po ri dags kyi gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-33: sprin char 'bebs zhes bya ba dang /
T02D1244:178a-34: byang du phug ring po'i dur khrod du shing aa shvattha dang /
T02D1244:178a-35: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa mi'i gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-39: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dpal mo'i nags kyi dur khrod du shing pa ta dang /
T02D1244:178a-40: rdzu 'phrul chen po pa ba lang gi gdong dang /
T02D1244:178a-44: thams cad du mchod rten blta bar bya ste /
T02D1244:178a-45: ser po dang dmar po dang nag po dang dud ka dang ljang gu dang /
T02D1244:178a-47: dbang po la sogs pa rnams ni /
T02D1244:178a-48: ser po dang sngo bsangs dang dkar po dang skya
T02D1244:178a-49: bo dang dmar po dang khra po dang nag po

T02D1244:181b-9: mig la gti mug rdo rjer 'gyur //
T02D1244:181b-10: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1244:181b-11: sna la ser sna ma zhes bya //
T02D1244:181b-12: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje can //
T02D1244:181b-13: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
T02D1244:181b-14: yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1244:181b-15: rdo rje ma dkar mo dang bdag med ma nag mo dang /

T02D1244:181b-23: go cha dang dbang po rnam par dag pa'i slad du'o //
T02D1244:181b-24: de'i rjes su sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi lam
T02D1244:181b-25: du aom a'a:h'u% zhes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis sa
T02D1244:181b-26: spyod ma dang bdag med ma ste rigs gsum bsgom
T02D1244:181b-27: par bya'o // 'di rnams thams cad ni phyag gnyis

T02D1244:181b-31: rang gi snying gnas 'thon pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis

T02D1244:181b-36: de nas sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pas /
T02D1244:181b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi bdud

T02D1244:181b-39: bar bya ste / ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //

T02D1244:181b-41: de bzhin bdag ni khrus bgyi ste //
T02D1244:181b-42: lha yi chu yis dag pa'o //
T02D1244:181b-43: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shr'i ye h'u% zhes brjod de //

T02D1244:182a-3: rnga bo che'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1244:182b-6: rdo rje ma dang sgra rdo rje ma dang ro

T02D1244:182b-14: spyan ma rnams kyis bstod de /

T02D1244:182b-18: snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad par mdzad //
T02D1244:182b-19: sgyu ma'i spros pa lhung mdzad rdo rje kye //

T02D1244:182b-24: bya'o // rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dag pa

T02D1244:182b-27: mi bskyod pa'i bdag nyid dbang bskur ba ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1244:182b-28: 'od dpag med kyi rang bzhin bdud rtsi myang ba ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1244:182b-29: don yod grub pa'i bdag nyid mchod pa ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1244:182b-30: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi bdag nyid bstod pa ni
T02D1244:182b-31: drug pa'o zhes pa yan lag drug bsgom par bya'o

T02D1244:182b-34: dang por sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i zla ba nya ba lta bur dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur ro //

T02D1244:183a-0: de nas goo r'i la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad @183a * //

T02D1244:183a-14: pa ni phyag gi gtso bo gnyis kyi nang du

T02D1244:183a-28: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor padma dkar po 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /

T02D1244:184b-11: de ltar khams gsum po ma lus pa nyid dkyil

T02D1244:184b-13: mtshungs par rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba tsam du

T02D1244:184b-19: srid gsum 'di min khang brtsegs yin te 'di rnams srog chags ma lags rgyal ba yin //

T02D1244:184b-23: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdor bstan pa'o //

T02D1244:184b-29: chos thams cad rang bzhin med cing mi phyed pa'i

T02D1244:184b-31: rdo rje'o // rig ma dang bcas pa'i rnam par

T02D1244:185a-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par dag pas shar gyi sgo'o //

T02D1244:185a-10: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa las /

T02D1244:185a-17: do // sangs rgyas thams cad thams cad du rgyun

T02D1244:186b-36: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang

T02D1244:186b-39: phyi rol du shes rab dang /
T02D1244:186b-40: thabs snyoms par 'jug pa ston pa'o //

T02D1244:186b-42: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang thun tshod brgyad dang /
T02D1244:187a-0: @187a * // chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams rnam par dag pas /

T02D1244:188a-16: de ltar 'di rnams brtan par byas te /

T02D1244:188a-19: dung gi phyag rgyas mdun du mchod yon phul nas /
